about.title: About Professor Kang
about.bio: Professor Kyung-Woo Kang is a distinguished researcher in Transportation Engineering at Hanyang University ERICA Campus. With over 30 years of experience, his research focuses on intelligent transportation systems (ITS), freight logistics, transportation economics, and traffic safety.
